verses.verse: The <S%G4413>former<s%> <S%G3056>treatise<s%> have I <S%G4160>made,<s%> O <S%G2321>Theophilus,<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> and <S%G1321>teach,<s%>

<S%G891>Until<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> he was <S%G353>taken<s%> up, after that he <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> had given <S%G1781>commandments<s%> to the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he had <S%G1586>chosen:<s%>

To <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he <S%G3936>showed<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G2198>alive<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> his <S%G3958>passion<s%> by <S%G4183>many<s%> infallible <S%G5039>proofs,<s%> being <S%G3700>seen<s%> of them <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> and <S%G3004>speaking<s%> of the things <S%G4012>pertaining<s%> to the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%>

And, being <S%G4871>assembled<s%> <S%G4817>together<s%> with them, <S%G3853>commanded<s%> them that they should not <S%G5562>depart<s%> from <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> but <S%G4037>wait<s%> for the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> which, <S%G3739><s%> said he, you have <S%G191>heard<s%> of me.

For <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> with <S%G5204>water;<s%> but you shall be <S%G907>baptized<s%> with the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> not <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> hence. <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5025><s%>

When they <S%G3767>therefore<s%> were <S%G4905>come<s%> <S%G4905>together,<s%> they <S%G1905>asked<s%> of him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> will you <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G600>restore<s%> <S%G600>again<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> to <S%G2474>Israel?<s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, It is not for you to <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G5550>times<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G2540>seasons,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G5087>put<s%> in his <S%G2398>own<s%> power. <S%G1849><s%>

But you shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1411>power,<s%> after that the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> is <S%G1904>come<s%> on you: and you shall be <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> to me <S%G5037>both<s%> in <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> and in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2449>Judaea,<s%> and in <S%G4540>Samaria,<s%> and to the <S%G2078>uttermost<s%> part of the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And when he had <S%G2036>spoken<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things, while they <S%G991>beheld,<s%> he was <S%G1869>taken<s%> up; and a <S%G3507>cloud<s%> <S%G5274>received<s%> him out of their <S%G3788>sight.<s%>

And <S%G5613>while<s%> they <S%G816>looked<s%> <S%G816>steadfastly<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> as he <S%G4198>went<s%> up, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G3936>stood<s%> by them in <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2066>apparel;<s%>

<S%G3739>Which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> You <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%> you <S%G1689>gazing<s%> up <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven?<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G353>taken<s%> up from you <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> shall <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> in <S%G3779>like<s%> <S%G5158>manner<s%> as you have <S%G2300>seen<s%> him <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> they to <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> from the <S%G3735>mount<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1638>Olivet,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is from <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day's <S%G3598>journey.<s%>

And <S%G3753>when<s%> they were <S%G1525>come<s%> in, they <S%G305>went<s%> up <S%G1519>into<s%> an <S%G5253>upper<s%> <S%G5253>room,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G2650>stayed<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> and <S%G2385>James,<s%> and <S%G2491>John,<s%> and <S%G406>Andrew,<s%> <S%G5376>Philip,<s%> and <S%G2381>Thomas,<s%> <S%G918>Bartholomew,<s%> and <S%G3156>Matthew,<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> the son of <S%G256>Alphaeus,<s%> and <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G2208>Zelotes,<s%> and <S%G2455>Judas<s%> the brother of <S%G2385>James.<s%>

<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4342>continued<s%> with <S%G3661>one<s%> <S%G3661>accord<s%> in <S%G4335>prayer<s%> and <S%G1162>supplication,<s%> with the <S%G1135>women,<s%> and <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and with his <S%G80>brothers.<s%>

And in <S%G5025>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G450>stood<s%> up in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> (the <S%G3793>number<s%> of <S%G3686>names<s%> <S%G1909>together<s%> were <S%G5613>about<s%> an <S%G1540>hundred<s%> and <S%G1501>twenty,<s%>)

<S%G435>Men<s%> and <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1124>scripture<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> needs have been <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> by the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G4277>spoke<s%> <S%G4277>before<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2455>Judas,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G3595>guide<s%> to them that <S%G4815>took<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
For he was <S%G2674>numbered<s%> with us, and had <S%G2975>obtained<s%> <S%G2819>part<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1248>ministry.<s%>

<S%G3767>Now<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> man <S%G2932>purchased<s%> a <S%G5564>field<s%> with the <S%G3408>reward<s%> of <S%G93>iniquity;<s%> and <S%G4248>falling<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G4248>headlong,<s%> he <S%G2997>burst<s%> <S%G2997>asunder<s%> in the <S%G3319>middle,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G4698>bowels<s%> <S%G1632>gushed<s%> out.

And it was <S%G1110>known<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2730>dwellers<s%> at <S%G2419>Jerusalem;<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> as that <S%G5564>field<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> in their <S%G2398>proper<s%> <S%G1258>tongue,<s%> <S%G184>Aceldama,<s%> that is to say, The <S%G5564>field<s%> of <S%G129>blood.<s%>

For it is <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G5568>Psalms,<s%> Let his <S%G1886>habitation<s%> be <S%G2048>desolate,<s%> and let <S%G3361>no<s%> man <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1722>therein:<s%> <S%G846><s%> and his position as <S%G1984>bishop<s%> let <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2983>take.<s%>

<S%G3767>Why<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> men which have <S%G4905>companied<s%> with us <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5550>time<s%> that the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1831><s%> in and out <S%G1909>among<s%> us,

<S%G756>Beginning<s%> from the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G2491>John,<s%> to that same <S%G2250>day<s%> that he was <S%G353>taken<s%> up from us, <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> be <S%G1096>ordained<s%> to be a <S%G3144>witness<s%> with us of his <S%G386>resurrection.<s%>

And they <S%G2476>appointed<s%> <S%G1417>two,<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G923>Barsabas,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> was <S%G1941>surnamed<s%> <S%G2459>Justus,<s%> and <S%G3159>Matthias.<s%>

And they <S%G4336>prayed,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> You, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> which <S%G2589>know<s%> the <S%G2589>hearts<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> men, <S%G322>show<s%> <S%G3739>whether<s%> <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> you have <S%G1586>chosen,<s%>

That he may <S%G2983>take<s%> <S%G2819>part<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1248>ministry<s%> and <S%G651>apostleship,<s%> from <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> by <S%G3845>transgression<s%> fell, that he might <S%G4198>go<s%> to his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5117>place.<s%>

And they <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1614>forth<s%> their <S%G2819>lots;<s%> and the <S%G2819>lot<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> on <S%G3159>Matthias;<s%> and he was <S%G4785>numbered<s%> with the <S%G1733>eleven<s%> <S%G652>apostles.<s%>
